Privacy Policy

What information we collect and store, where we get this information, and how we use this information
To verify your identity, you will need to provide us with the following information with your request:

A cookie is a small piece of data sent from a website and stored on your device by your browser.
This Website collects cookies and may use cookies for reasons including, but not limited to:

This Website uses Google Analytics to collect information about you and your behaviors.
We collect and store the following information about you:
We use the information that we collect about you for direct marketing purposes.
We collect and store any and all information that you enter on this Website.
To verify your identity, you will need to provide us with the following information with your request: IP address;
To verify your identity, you will need to provide us with the following information with your request: Name;

Privacy Policy

With whom we share your personal information
Should a child whom we know to be under 18 send personal information to us, we will use that information only to respond to that child to inform him or her that they cannot use this Website.
To verify your identity, you will need to provide us with the following information with your request: Phone number;
